acknowledgements: {"blocks":[{"key":"anb59","text":"The work was supported by funding from the Shastri Indo-Canadian Institute (SICI) Shastri Covid-19 Pandemic Response Grant (SCPRG) and Canada’s International Development Research Centre (IDRC) (109434-001) through the Canadian 2019 Novel Coronavirus (COVID-19) Rapid Research Funding Opportunity and the National Agency for Research and Development (ANID). ZIKV Sensor27B 772 LacZ and ZIKV NASBA 27B were a gift from James Collins \u0026 773 Alexander Green (Addgene plasmids #75010 and #75006). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"31s2s","text":"Before you start you need the DNA sequences that are provided in the attached files.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"eng8h","text":"This method details the approach to using in vitro transcription-translation (TxTr) systems based on PURExpress adsorbed on a paper disc. These to run a toehold detection reaction for COVID RNA. The work is related to a manuscript titled \"Translational Enhancer Based Ampli cation of Toehold Sensors (TacToe) for Improved Sensitivity and Speed of Viral RNA Detection\" to appear in ACS Synthetic Biology.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
disclaimer: {"blocks":[{"key":"7euoa","text":"This method is a scientific protocol that has not been validated on clinical samples so far. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
keywords: toehold, sensor, point of care, covid, zika, RNA,diagnostics,point-of-care,filter-paper,lacZ
manuscript_citation: {"blocks":[{"key":"7r8dc","text":"Tanvi Kale, Rudvi Pednekar, Séverine Marianne Cazaux, Valentina Ferrando Letelier, Justin R. J. Vigar, Fernán Federici, Keith Pardee, and Chaitanya A. Athale (accepted) Translational Enhancer Based Amplification of Toehold Sensors (TacToe) for Improved Sensitivity and Speed of Viral RNA Detection. ACS Synthetic Biology","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ajman","text":"https://doi.org/10.1021/acssynbio.4c00861","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"fnq0d","text":"Whatman Filter Paper discs","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"feibv","text":"Biopsy Punch (3 mm) with metal caps","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"70fpm","text":"PureXpress CFE","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9mn5k","text":"Toehold plasmid DNA","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5isl4","text":"384 well plate (Corning Costar)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1455u","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"52a0a","text":"BSA treated paper disk preparation:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":35}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6rm7a","text":"1) Make 5% BSA solution in ultrapure water","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9q86l","text":"2) Soak filter paper disc (Whatmann filter paper 42, ashless, dm 42.5) in BSA solution, keep it at room temperature for overnight in a beaker ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c240m","text":"3) Rinse the filter paper using ultrapure water (repeat the process for 5 times)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fmgjt","text":"4) Let filter paper dry at room temperature (overnight) or at 65 ºc in hybridizer (~1-1.5h)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bpcv6","text":"5) Use sterile 2mm/3mm biopsy punch to create small paper discs ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ee3he","text":"6) Store the discs in sterile petri plate","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6aord","text":"From the 7 μl master-mix, pipette out 2μl on each paper-disk placed in a 384 well plate to get triplicates of each reaction (2μl x 3).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3uqm3","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9saqk","text":"Freeze drying disks with CFE (Home-made or PURExpress)+ CPRG","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":60}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7b09t","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"crsau","text":"1. Cell free reaction (Mastermix + CFE) applied on paper discs (3mm)(Mastermix 1.02ul +CFE 0.44ul)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3vq25","text":"2. Air dry","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1cnea","text":"3. Flash freeze in liquid Nitrogen ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1c00","text":"4. Put  the disc in PCR tubes (1disc/tube). Make 4 small holes on capusing sterile syringe.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9f715","text":"5. Put the tubes in lyophilizer @-75 ºC, 4 hour , 0.04 mbar pressure ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"em5ke","text":"6. Samples store @Room Temperature in sterile falcon with silica inside ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7v51q","text":"7. Rehydration: Plasmid (~24nM) + water  (0.54ul)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ahd1r","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Filter-paper based PURExpress detection of ZikV and CoV2  RNA by enhancer toehold (TacToe) sensors
